title: LineageOS 19 adds support for Poco X3 and three other phones
content:
LineageOS is one of the best custom ROMs available, bringing new versions of Android and a clean software experience to many different phones and tablets. LineageOS 19 officially arrived earlier this week, based on Android 12, and now more devices have been added to the roster. LineageOS 19 launched with a total of 41 supported

The post LineageOS 19 adds support for Poco X3 and three other phones appeared first on XDA.
description: LineageOS 19 has arrived on the Motorola G100/Motorola Edge S, Nubia Mini 5G, Xiaomi Poco X3/X3 NFC, and original Razer Phone.
